If an #ICE agent comes to your house:  Do not open the door  Ask to see a warrant through the window or ask for it to be slipped under the door.  If they do not have a warrant signed by a judge, ask them to leave. #KnowYourRights!

If you are arrested by #ICE:  You have the right to remain silent – ICE can use anything you say against you in your immigration case  You have the right to speak with a lawyer  Don’t sign any documents before speaking to a lawyer #KnowYourRights!

Si agentes de #ICE vienen a su vivienda:  No abra la puerta  Pida ver una orden judicial a través de la ventana o pida que la deslicen por debajo de la puerta.
 Si no tienen una orden judicial firmada por un juez, pídales que se vayan. #KnowYourRights
